comments:
Build ID: I20070621-1340

Steps To Reproduce:

Create a help context with empty description:
<context id="my_context"><description></description>
<topic label="This is my context" href="path/to/my_context.html"></topic></context>

Create an app that calls:
HelpSystem.getContext ("my_context");

Get an error:
Error querying context provider (org.eclipse.help.internal.context.ContextFileProvider) with context Id: my_context

java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.eclipse.help.internal.context.Context.getText(Context.java:88)
at org.eclipse.help.internal.context.Context.<init>(Context.java:39)
at org.eclipse.help.internal.context.ContextManager.getContext(ContextManager.java:81)
at org.eclipse.help.HelpSystem.getContext(HelpSystem.java:49)
...

This is a duplicate - it was fixed for 3.3.1.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 197250 ***
